name: The Crisper Whisperer: Turkey Salad with Pomegranate and Pistachios
description: Note: You may know Carolyn Cope as Umami Girl. She stops by on Tuesdays with ideas on preparing fruits and vegetables. [Photograph: Carolyn Cope] For those of us who love food, the days between Thanksgiving and New Years can be...
recipeIngredient: 1 shallot or a bit of red onion, minced
4 cups baby arugula or other bitter salad greens, washed and dried
3 cups cooked, shredded turkey meat (or chicken)

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, vinegar, red onion and salt and pepper. Place the arugula or greens in a medium bowl. Spoon one or two Tablespoons of the dressing over the greens and toss to coat lightly. Divide the greens among four plates.

Combine the turkey, pomegranate seeds, celery, pistachios and parsley in the same bowl used for the greens. Pour in the remaining dressing along with an extra sprinkle of salt and pepper and toss to coat. Place some of the turkey salad over the greens on each plate and serve.
